resources.string: Um die Kenntnisse der Viking Engineer Trainees zu testen

string-array.name: question1
string-array.item: Where do you find the flow monitor of cooling fluid for Converters in the bow?
In the auxiliary engine room bow.

string-array.name: question2
string-array.item: Where do you find the flow monitor of cooling fluid for Converters in the aft?
In the auxiliary engine room bow.

string-array.name: question3
string-array.item: Where is the expansion tank of Generator nr.2?
In the coolroom in front of the kitchen.
In the auxiliary engine room bow.

string-array.name: question4
string-array.item: How much hydraulic oil does the steering system tank contain?

string-array.name: question5
string-array.item: How much oil fills the oil sump from ADD to FULL mark in the C18 engine?

string-array.name: question6
string-array.item: How much oil fills the oil sump from ADD to FULL mark in the C32 engine?

string-array.name: question7
string-array.item: How often do you replace the engine oil and filters on the C18/C32 engines?

string-array.name: question8
string-array.item: How often do you replace engine oil and filters on the C6.6 generator?

string-array.name: question9
string-array.item: What day of the month is the deadline for sending the monthly order list?

string-array.name: question10
string-array.item: How often do you replace the gear oil in the winches?

string-array.name: question11
string-array.item: How often do you replace the oil in the compressors?

string-array.name: question12
string-array.item: How often do you grease the winches?

string-array.name: question13
string-array.item: How often do you grease the u-shafts?

string-array.name: question14
string-array.item: How often do you grease the cranes?

string-array.name: question15
string-array.item: How often do you grease the scissor lift of the wheelhouse?

string-array.name: question16
string-array.item: How often do you grease the bearings of the C18 generator sets?

string-array.name: question17
string-array.item: How often do you grease the bearings of the C32 generator sets?

string-array.name: question18
string-array.item: How often do you grease the bearings of the electrical drives in the bow?

string-array.name: question19
string-array.item: How often do you grease the bearings of the electrical drives in the aft?

string-array.name: question20
string-array.item: How often do you grease the bearings of the sewage plant\'s water pumps?

string-array.name: question21
string-array.item: How often do you grease the seawater-pumps of the air conditioning plant?

string-array.name: question22
string-array.item: How often do you grease the coolant circulation pumps of the air conditioning plant?

string-array.name: question23
string-array.item: How often do you rinse the tanks of the sewage plant?
